newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH HN-WOOD INDEX RISES EIGHT POINTS TO 1,512.
newsitem.headline: CZECH HN-WOOD INDEX RISES EIGHT POINTS TO 1,512.

text.p: The HN-Wood index, measuring the 60 most capitalised issues on the Prague Stock Exchange, on Monday rose eight points, or 0.53 percent, to 1,512 points, the brokerage house Wood & Company said.
